text: The discography of the Korean-American singer-songwriter Eric Nam consists of five extended plays, eleven singles, eleven collaboration singles, eight appearances in soundtracks and eighteen music videos. == Extended plays == {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" !
